About
About
Experienced in Supply Chain Design and Optimization. Currently working in the Services org of xto10x and leading engagements across Network Design, Process Design and Customer NPS. 

Worked in the Supply Chain Design team of Flipkart in different stints that involved developing ecommerce supply chains (First Mile, Sortation Center, Network Design, Last Mile) across different business models (Small and Medium parcels, Hyperlocal, B2B Wholesale). Also worked to develop optimization models using operations research tools & techniques.

Actively interested in the fields of mathematical optimization, heuristics and data sciences.

Specialties: E-commerce Supply Chain, Logistics, Process Design, Optimization, Data Modelling & Simulation, Decision Sciences.

1mo • 
 1 month ago • Visible to anyone on or off LinkedIn
🚀 Scaling Ambition with Precision: TOMOH’s Global Growth Programs

Over the past year, TOMOH delivered two high-impact international programs — each targeting a critical success factor for scaleups: leadership development and execution excellence.

🔹 Scaling Founders Program (with CCL)
This program focused on strengthening founders’ leadership capabilities through:
 • 360° leadership assessments
 • A two-day immersive retreat
 • Five tailored coaching sessions with international executive coaches

💡 The results?
• Improved decision-making clarity
• Stronger team alignment
• Enhanced strategic vision
• Record-setting performance reported during and after the program

🔹 Scaling Companies Program (with xto10x)
This intensive journey supported companies in unlocking growth through focused “deep work” across four areas:
• Customer growth
• Operational efficiency
• Organizational design
• People development

📊 Outcomes achieved:
• Uplift in customer retention by up to 20 percentage points
• Revenue unlocks exceeding SAR 2.7M
• Profitability increased by up to 17% through operational improvements
• 10x growth enabled by structured goal-setting frameworks like OKRs
• +25 point boost in customer satisfaction (NPS) through CX redesign

These programs brought world-class methods to our scaleups — equipping them with practical tools to overcome bottlenecks and sustain growth momentum.

A big thank you to our international partners and to the ambitious TOMOH founders who continue to drive transformation in the Kingdom.

Projects
Projects
Free Path Detection for Autonomous Human Navigation
Free Path Detection for Autonomous Human Navigation
Jul 2014 - Present
Jul 2014 - Present
The project concentrates on detecting free path that lies ahead of a blind person. A camera connected around the waist captures the image containing free path along with various obstacles in the next few steps. The goal is to decide if the blind person can continue his movement; otherwise in case of obstacles give a warning.

Got shortlisted for the final round of BK Ray Memorial Award for best final year thesis.

Identify battery cell technologies that will underpin the next generation of electric and hybrid electric vehicles. Evaluate battery test data and the associated “cost/benefit” of the test method with a view to better supporting future productionisation and the volume manufacture of low carbon vehicles.
Construct prognostic models in which early-stage test results may be used to predict the suitability of an energy storage technology thereby negating the need for latter stage, resource-intensive test methods.

Tanveer is a talent of infinite possibilities.A supply chain optimisation expert who can covert any business problem into a mathematical model find the most optimal solution and covert it back to a scalable technology enabled business process.In the past three years that we have worked together in Flipkart I have seen Tanveer conceptualising and delivering multiple path breaking solutions which helped the supply chain to operate at 10x scale and deliver flagship events like BBD with maximum reliability and minimum cost.

March 20, 2019,Abhishekwas senior toTanveerbut didn't manageTanveerdirectly
Tanveer's one of the brightest spots at Flipkart. I consider myself lucky for having had the opportunity of closely working with him over the last few months. In my opinion, his ability to connect the dots & end to end thinking has been second to none. He's someone who is able to look beyond the obvious and unlock opportunities hitherto unknown. He is one of the most self-assured persons i've come across. And another thing that stands out in Tanveer is his selfless attitude & his willingness to support projects and initiatives beyond his usual domain. In addition to strong design thinking mindset, he packs a solid punch on the analytics front as well. eKart's supply chain network is powered by one of the extensive models built by Tanveer. Tanveer's destined for great things & wishing him the very best!

Publications

Adaptive saliency-weighted obstacle detection for the visually challenged
Adaptive saliency-weighted obstacle detection for the visually challenged
IEEE
IEEE
Show publication
This paper focuses on distinguishing obstacles from free regions towards navigation of the visually challenged. This is an important and challenging research problem due to the unconstrained navigating environment containing diverse obstacles. It is necessary to detect if any obstacles are lying ahead in advance with high precision which will result in a warning to the person.
